full_summary:
# Supply and Delivery of Kitchen Equipment – CFB Kingston

## Tender Information
* **Reference Number:** WS3741777885-Doc3763079462
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3741777885
* **Publication Date:** 2022-11-28
* **Closing Date and Time:** 2022-12-19 14:00:00 EST - **Please note that any bids received after 14:00 EST will not be considered.**
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-02-15

## Procurement Category and Method
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

## Trade Agreements
* **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**
* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
* **Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)**
* ***And 13 other trade agreements**

## Regions of Opportunity, Delivery, and Contracting Entity
* **Region of Opportunity:** None
* **Region of Delivery:** Kingston
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada

## Request for Proposal
The Department of National Defence – Canadian Force Base Kingston requires the supply and delivery of kitchen equipment. Bidders must clearly demonstrate compliance with the Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria, as outlined in the tender package.

## Contact Information
If you have any questions or require further information regarding this tender, please contact Crystal Denton:
* Phone: (647) 515-4791
* Email: <crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

Please note that the French version of this notice follows the English version. If you require further assistance or translation support, please do not hesitate to contact us. 

## Notice URLs and Attachments
